name: Money Masters: Life Simulator
description:
How to become rich and famous when you have nothing? Find out in this real-life sim! Go from being a simple street kid to a billionaire with cars, apartments and lot of money. Money Masters: Life Simulator lets you start your own business and get crazy rich. Let your creative side run wild as you try to become a millionaire. Sure, it won't be easy - but you've got to try, right? This real-life sim lets you go from rags to incredible riches. Money Masters: Life Simulator is a chance to challenge yourself and prove that a simple street kid can become a billionaire. That game feels just like real life, and it's up to you to decide how to become super rich. Show off your business skills and write your own success story! Want to go from zero to hero? Then you need Money Masters: Life Simulator! There's no time to waste - cars, yachts and fancy penthouses don't buy themselves. Gameplay:
- start off with nothing to your name
- graduate from college and get a prestigious job
- gain enough experience to open your own business
- start a family and improve your social standing
- buy penthouses, cars and planes
You can win piles of money at the casino or double your earnings on the stock market - there are lots of ways to get filthy rich! Money Masters: Life Simulator now to find out what you're made of!
